content: washcloth designed by mawdsleyfibrearts materials  1 skein 50gm/1 5oz bernat handicrafter cotton or other dk- weight cotton yarn  tapestry needle  3 5mm us 4 uk 9 needles or needles that will match your yarn choice pattern notes this washcloth is worked from tip to tip where the first half of the project increases a stitch each row and the second half of the project decreases a stitch each row directions cast on 3 stitches using preferred cast on technique row 1 knit all stitches row 2-43 k2 yo knit to end of row row 44-84 k1 k2tog yo k2tog knit to end of row cast off stitches using preferred cast off technique using a tapestry needles weave in ends thank-you for knitting this pattern please share your project on ravelry at https //www ravelry com/people/mawdsleyfibrearts © 2020 mawdsleyfibrearts
